title: Nature: Plants (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Plants subcategory within Nature. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.english: The cherry blossoms are pretty, aren't they?
Japanese people enjoy cherry blossom viewing at night as well.
cards.japanese: 日本人は、夜桜も楽しみます。

cards.english: Chrysanthemums are a typical flower to offer at the Buddhist family altar and tomb.
cards.romaji: Kiku wa, bukka no daihy teki na hana desu.
cards.japanese: 菊は、仏花の代表的な花です。

cards.english: The color of a hydrangea depends on the pH level in the soil.
cards.romaji: Ajisai no hana no iro wa, doj no sanseido ni yotte kimarimasu.
cards.japanese: アジサイの花の色は、土壌の酸性度によって決まります。
